verses.1: Moses in Israel mihonpi khempeuh khawmin amaute kiangah, “Hihte pen noteʼ hih ding Topaʼ hong thupiak ahi hi.
verses.2: Ni guk sungin nasep kiman dinga, ahih hangin a ni sagih ni-in thupi a tawlngakna Sabbath siangtho Topaʼ tungah na nei ding uh hi. Tua ni-in na khat peuhpeuh a sem peuhmah kithat ding hi.
verses.3: Sabbath ni-in na teenna khempeuh uh ah mei na cih kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
verses.4: Moses in Israel mihonpite khempeuh tungah, “ Topaʼ hong thupiak hih bang ahi hi:
verses.5: Note in Topaʼ tungah biakna na pia ding uh hi. A pia nuam peuhmah in Topaʼ tungah biakna paipih un. Tuate in: Kham, ngun le sumngo,
verses.6: a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute le a kopin a kikhuk puan hoihte, keel mul,
verses.7: a kisansak tuutal vunte le savunte; singkha sing,
verses.8: meivak ading sathau, nilh sathau le a paknamtui dingin a namtui nate,
verses.9: siampi puan le awmdal ah bulh dingin onik suang le suang dangte ahi hi.
verses.10: “Noteʼ lak panin siamna a nei mi peuhmah hong paisak unla, Topaʼ thupiak sa khempeuh bawlsak un. Tua a bawl dingte pen biakbuk,
verses.11: a puanbuk le a khuhna, a vankhainate le a khuampeekte, a zawlte, a khuampite, a bullente;
verses.12: singkuang a zawlte tawh, hehpihna tokhom le kongkhak dalna puan;
verses.13: sabuai a zawlte le a nazatte khempeuh tawh, Ompihna Anlum;
verses.14: khuavak dingin meivak khuam zong, a nazatte le a meivakte tawh, meivak dingin sathau;
verses.15: paknamtui biakna tau, a zawlte tawh, nilh sathau le a namtui paknamtui le biakbuk kongah kongkhak ading puankhai;
verses.16: meihal biakna tau, a sumngo siklen, a zawlte, a nazatte khempeuh, kuang le a ngakna tawh;
verses.17: buktual a a puankhaite, a khuampite le a bullente tawh, tual kongpi ading puankhai;
verses.18: biakbuk khetphimte le huang khetphimte le a khaute;
verses.19: siangtho munah zat dingin limtakin a kigan puante, amauʼ siampi nasep nadingin siampi Aaron ading puan siangtho le ama tapateʼ puante ahi hi,” a ci hi.
verses.20: Tua ciangin Israel mihonpi khempeuh Mosesʼ omna panin paikhia uh hi.
verses.21: Piak nopna lungsim a nei mi peuhmah hong pai tawm uh a, kikhopna buk le a nasep nading khempeuh le puan siangthote a zat dingin Topa ading a piakte uh hong puak uh hi.
verses.22: Tua ahih ciangin numei, pasal hong pai uh hi. Piak nopna lungsim a neite khempeuh in tukkilhte, bilbahte, min gelhna zungbuhte le banbulhte ahi kham tawh a kibawl na namkim hong paipih uh a, a milip in Topaʼ tungah kham tawh piakna ap uh hi.
verses.23: A dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute, puan hoih, keel mul, a kisansak tuutal vunte, ahih kei leh savun hoihte ahi zongin a nei mi peuhmah in tuate hong paipih uh hi.
verses.24: Ngun ahi a, sumngo ahi zongin a pia thei peuhmah in Topaʼ tungah tua nate paipih uh a, nasep nadinga kimang thei ding singkha sing a nei mi peuhmah in zong hong paipih hi.
verses.25: A hih thei numei khempeuh in a khut uh tawh khau khuk uh a, amauʼ khuk sa a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute le a kopin a kikhuk khaute hong paipih uh hi.
verses.26: Hih theih siamna a nei numei khempeuh in zong keel mul khuk uh hi.
verses.27: Makaite in siampi puan le awmdal a bulh dingin onik suang le suang dangte,
verses.28: meivak ding, nilh sathau ding le paknamtui dingin a namtui nate le sathau hong paipih uh hi.
verses.29: Topa in Moses tunga a thupiak sa nasep nadingin na khat peuhpeuh a pia nuam numei pasal Israel mi khempeuh in utthu-a biakna-in Topaʼ tungah hong paipih uh hi.
verses.30: Moses in Israel mite kiangah, “Thei un; Topa in a minin Judah minam, Hurʼ tapa Uri, Uriʼ tapa Bezalel sam khin hi.
verses.31: Lim hoihte a geel ding; kham, ngun, sumngo tawh na a bawl ding; siamna nam khempeuh nasep nading, bulh ding suang seekna le singzep nasep a sem dingin amah in vangliatna, siamna, pilna, theihna le khutsiam nasep khempeuh tawh amah kidimsak hi.
verses.34: Topa in amah le Dan minam Ahisamakʼ tapa Oholiab tungah midangte hilh siamna pia khin hi.
verses.35: Amah in khutsiam nasep, geel siam nasep; a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute le a kopin a kikhuk puan zep siam nasep; siamgat siamna le geel siam nasep ahi zongin nasep namkim a sem dingin amaute tungah siamna a guan hi.
